metadata.title: CVE-2021-26690 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache HTTP Server versions 2.4.0 to 2.4.46 A specially crafted Cookieheader handled by mod_session can cause a NULL pointer dereference andcrash, leading to a possible Denial Of Service

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26690` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
apache2-bin - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
apache2-data - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
apache2-utils - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
libapache2-mod-md - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi - 2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.41-4ubuntu3.3').
